meanings.sent1: The uncoordinated team struggled to finish the project on time.
meanings.sent2: The uncoordinated dance routine looked messy and chaotic.
meanings.sent3: The uncoordinated party planning led to a mix-up with the invitations.
meanings.sent4: Her uncoordinated schedule resembled a jumbled puzzle with missing pieces.
meanings.sent5: The uncoordinated plan fell apart like a house of cards in a storm.

meanings.definition: Not working together smoothly or efficiently
meanings.sent1: The uncoordinated efforts of the group resulted in a failed mission.
meanings.sent2: The uncoordinated traffic caused delays for commuters.
meanings.sent3: The uncoordinated kitchen staff kept bumping into each other during the rush.
meanings.sent4: Their uncoordinated teamwork was like a car with wheels going in different directions.
meanings.sent5: The uncoordinated collaboration felt like trying to dance with two left feet.
